description: In the eight Gym matches leading up to the League, Darkrai was the only Pok√©mon Takuto used to battle against the gym leaders and was able to win all the matches. Takuto`s Darkrai also managed to get through the first and second fighting rounds of the Sinnoh League all by itself. Satoshi`s Sceptile finally managed to defeated it.
name: Darkrai (Takuto)
